blogPost.excerpt: Build an admin panel for your Rails application in a minute. No code, no hassle — save time and money by trying Forest Admin for free.
blogPost.body: Build an admin panel for your Rails application in a minute. No code, no hassle — save time and money by trying Forest Admin for free.
blogPost.title: Forest Admin for Rails - Fully-featured admin panel for Ruby on Rails apps
blogPost.author: Nicolas Dessaigne

localize.description: 在一分钟内为您的Rails应用程序建立一个管理面板。没有代码，没有麻烦--免费试用Forest Admin，节省时间和金钱。
localize.tagline: 为Ruby on Rails应用程序提供功能齐全的管理面板。

localize.description: 在一分鐘內爲您的Rails應用程序建立一個管理面板。沒有代碼，沒有麻煩--免費試用Forest Admin，節省時間和金錢。
localize.tagline: 爲Ruby on Rails應用程序提供功能齊全的管理面板。
